Represents the number 0 (zero) in the Oriya script.
ଏକ (ek). Represents the number 1 (one) in the Oriya script.
ଦୁଇ (du'i). Represents the number 2 (two) in the Oriya script.
ତିନି (tini). Represents the number 3 (three) in the Oriya script.
ଚାରି (cāri). Represents the number 4 (four) in the Oriya script.
ପାଞ୍ଚ (pāñch). Represents the number 5 (five) in the Oriya script.
ଛଅ (cha'a). Represents the number 6 (six) in the Oriya script.
ସାତ (sāt). Represents the number 7 (seven) in the Oriya script.
ଆଠ (āṭh). Represents the number 8 (eight) in the Oriya script.
ନଅ (na'a). Represents the number 9 (nine) in the Oriya script.
